entry.title: Photos Post 34: Special Events (after 1975), Part 48
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 4 Photos of the special event 1990-0109 Śhrī Gaurī Pūjā, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 4 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1990.
The event has as well 2 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, August 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, August 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 25 new Photos were uploaded to 11 Pūjas as follows (12 high resolutions and 13 low resolutions).
(i) 1979-0100 Pūjā A: 3 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979.
(ii) 1979-0100 Pūjā B: 4 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979.
(iii) 1979-0100 Pūjā C: 2 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979.
(iv) 1979-012x Pūjā D: 2 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979.
(v) 1979-1202 Guru Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link UK 1979.
(vi) 1980-0118 Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1980.
(vii) 1981-0504 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 1 low resolution uploaded, link UK 1981.
(viii) 1982-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 3 high resolutions uploaded, link UK 1982.
(ix) 1988-0806 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link France 1986.
(x) 1988-0820 Śhrī Viṣhṇumāyā Pūjā: 4 high resolutions and 1 low resolution uploaded, link UK 1988.
(xi) 1992-0203 Śhrī Mahāsaraswatī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1992.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

(i) 1979-0100 Pūjā A: 3 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979. (ii) 1979-0100 Pūjā B: 4 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979. (iii) 1979-0100 Pūjā C: 2 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979. (iv) 1979-012x Pūjā D: 2 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979. (v) 1979-1202 Guru Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link UK 1979. (vi) 1980-0118 Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1980. (vii) 1981-0504 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 1 low resolution uploaded, link UK 1981. (viii) 1982-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 3 high resolutions uploaded, link UK 1982. (ix) 1988-0806 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link France 1986. (x) 1988-0820 Śhrī Viṣhṇumāyā Pūjā: 4 high resolutions and 1 low resolution uploaded, link UK 1988.
